title: Practical Language Proficiency Improvement Program Using Interactive Learning Models

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and learning motivation
context.additional_context: Blended Learning Environment Utilizing In-Class Group Activities and Digital Devices (Tablets/Laptops)

learning_goals: Learners can identify and provide feedback on at least three areas for improvement in peers' language proficiency through peer assessment activities.
Learners can accurately use the target language (job-related terms/expressions) in role-play scenarios simulating real workplace situations with over 80% accuracy.
Learner groups can write reflective journals after collaborative projects and derive at least two growth points per individual.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
